measure.name: Hot Water Heater Efficiency
measure.description: Hot water heaters can last for many years, and older hot water heaters often have an efficiency below what is available today. Changing out an existing hot water heater for a more efficient model often has a quick payback in buildings with high water consumption, like hotels, dormitories, barracks, etc.
measure.modeler_description: User selectes either a single hot water heater or all hot water heaters. Measure loops through all selected water heaters, increasing their efficiency according to the user input, and adding a first cost according to the user input.
